SELECT res_name, sum(tc) as stc FROM ( SELECT R.RES_NAME, R.RES_CHAIR, R.res_table_count, RR.SDATE, R.res_table_count-NVL(RR.CNT,0) AS TC FROM (SELECT res_name,RES_CHAIR, res_table_count FROM RESTAURANT) R LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT RES_NAME, RES_CHAIR, RR_DATE AS SDATE,COUNT(RR_DATE) CNT FROM RESTAURANT_RESERVATION
RR_DATE = TO_DATE(#{dateTime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi')
GROUP BY RES_NAME, RES_CHAIR, RR_DATE) RR ON(R.RES_NAME = RR.RES_NAME AND R.RES_CHAIR = RR.RES_CHAIR) ORDER BY R.RES_NAME ASC, R.RES_CHAIR DESC)
res_name = #{value}
GROUP BY res_name

r.RR_NO = #{num}

SELECT r.res_name, r.RES_CHAIR, r.res_table_count-(select count(res_chair) from restaurant_reservation where rr_date = #{curDate} AS tableleft FROM restaurant r left outer join restaurant_reservation rr ON(r.res_chair = rr.res_chair and r.res_name = rr.res_name) WHERE r.res_name=#{resName} GROUP BY r.res_name, r.RES_CHAIR, r.res_table_count ORDER BY r.RES_CHAIR DESC
